task.title: Enable Geofencing in the Time Feature
task.shortdesc: Geofencing provides employees with the freedom to record their activity on their mobile devices while affording managers the peace of mind that their employees are exactly where they are expected to be. The geofencing option is delivered off and must be enabled.

step.cmd: 1. On the Company Preferences page, select the type of geofencing at the Geofence Enforcement field:

ul.li: Active – When employees are assigned to a fence group and they punch in outside of a valid fence, the time punch is marked invalid and it is not processed to the timesheet. This offers the most control but could constrain employees who are working in areas with poor connectivity or bad GPS signals.
Passive – When employees are assigned to a fence group and they punch in outside of a valid fence, the time punch is flagged as a geofencing exception, but it is still processed to the timesheet.

step.info: To disable geofencing, select Noneand then select Save.
